MAX_RETRIES.name: MAX_RETRIES
MAX_RETRIES.displayName: Indicates max number of retries when retries are enabled.

STATE_PERSISTENCE_STRATEGY.name: STATE_PERSISTENCE_STRATEGY
STATE_PERSISTENCE_STRATEGY.displayName: How state is persisted (note that memory is volatile).

OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT.name: OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT
OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT.displayName: Token endpoint used for Oauth2 client credentials flow.

AUTHORIZATION_STRATEGY.name: AUTHORIZATION_STRATEGY
AUTHORIZATION_STRATEGY.displayName: Authorization strategy for the internal http client.

STATUSES_TO_RETRY.name: STATUSES_TO_RETRY
STATUSES_TO_RETRY.displayName: Custom comma seperated list of http status codes that can trigger a retry in the http client.

API_KEY_HEADER_PROPERTY.name: API_KEY_HEADER_PROPERTY
API_KEY_HEADER_PROPERTY.displayName: API header that should be used for the API key

API_KEY_PROPERTY.name: API_KEY_PROPERTY
API_KEY_PROPERTY.displayName: API key that should be used to access the API.

OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.name: OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET
OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.displayName: Client secret used for Oauth2 client credentials flow

OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.name: OAUTH_CLIENT_ID
OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.displayName: Client id used for Oauth2 client credentials flow

KEEP_STATE.name: KEEP_STATE
KEEP_STATE.displayName: Keep state when the processor is removed from the flow

RETRIES_ENABLED.name: RETRIES_ENABLED
RETRIES_ENABLED.displayName: Indicates of retries are enabled when the http request fails.
